function.name: sandbox_python_execute
function.arguments:
{"code":"# Given values from previous steps
L = 11  # Last two digits of the year of the Venezuelan Declaration of Independence (1811)
A = 3   # Number of colors in the TikTok logo excluding black and white
C = 150 # Average height of women in the Philippines rounded to nearest whole cm

# The equation to solve is:
# Lx = (d/dx * (A * x^2)) + 4097 - C
# Simplifying the equation:
# Lx = (2 * A * x) + 4097 - C
# Lx = 2 * A * x + 4097 - C
# Lx = 2 * 3 * x + 4097 - 150
# Lx = 6x + 3947

# Solving for x:
# Lx = 6x + 3947
# 11x = 6x + 3947
# 11x - 6x = 3947
# 5x = 3947
# x = 3947 / 5

x = 3947 / 5
x_rounded = round(x, 1)
x_rounded","packages":[]}

A is the number of colors in the TikTok logo as of July 2023, excluding black and white,
and C is the height of the average woman in the Philippines according to a July 2023 Business Insider article, rounded to the nearest whole centimeter

‚ö†Ô∏è  REMEMBER: All your work must contribute to answering the ORIGINAL TASK above!

In establishing an independent nation, the Venezuelan ‚ÄúFirma Acta de la Independencia,‚Äù or ‚ÄúSigning of the Act of Independence,‚Äù aimed to create a society based on democratic principals long denied to them. Venezuela was the first South American nation to have an uprising for independence, led at first by Francisco de Miranda, and then by Simon Bolivar and Jose Felix Ribas, who were inspired by the American Revolution. function.name: sandbox_python_execute
function.arguments:
{"code":"# Given values from previous steps
L = 11  # Last two digits of the year of the Venezuelan Declaration of Independence (1811)
A = 3   # Number of colors in the TikTok logo excluding black and white
C = 150 # Average height of women in the Philippines rounded to nearest whole cm

# The equation to solve is:
# Lx = (d/dx * (A * x^2)) + 4097 - C
# Simplifying the equation:
# Lx = (2 * A * x) + 4097 - C
# Lx = 2 * A * x + 4097 - C
# Lx = 2 * 3 * x + 4097 - 150
# Lx = 6x + 3947

# Solving for x:
# Lx = 6x + 3947
# 11x = 6x + 3947
# 11x - 6x = 3947
# 5x = 3947
# x = 3947 / 5

x = 3947 / 5
x_rounded = round(x, 1)
x_rounded","packages":[]}
